short_summary: Bid / RFQ on Project Leader/Executive Senior (Level 3) consulting service to support Fighter Capability Office, supporting the objectives of the FCO and defining the scope, the deliverables and the implementation conditions for future fighter capability requirements.
description: This bid solicitation is being issued to satisfy the requirement of the Department of National Defence for the provision of Task and Solutions Professional Services. The Fighter Capability Office (FCO), within the Department of National Defence (DND) is seeking Senior Project Leader/Executive consulting service. Senior Project Leader/Executive consulting service are required to support the objectives of the FCO and to define and monitor the scope, the deliverables and the implementation conditions that apply to the Department’s future fighter capability requirements.
duration_in_months: These values were not provided explicitly. Based on the data given, the provided approximation is two years, plus three (3) irrevocable option year to extend the term of the contract making the estimated total duration 67 months
full_summary:
## Upcoming Procurement Opportunity

### Project Leader/Executive (Level 3) - Request for Proposal

The Department of National Defence is seeking proposals for the provision of Level 3 Project Leader/Executive services.

### Background

The Fighter Capability Office (FCO) requires the services of one (1) Senior Project Leader/Executive consultant to support the objectives of the FCO and to define and monitor the scope, deliverables, and implementation conditions for the Department's future fighter capability requirements.

### Key Requirements

* Provide Level 3 Project Leader/Executive services to support the Fighter Capability Office
* Conduct project planning, execution, and monitoring activities
* Ensure delivery of project results and implementation of recommendations
* Collaborate with stakeholders to identify and address project risks
* Develop and maintain project schedules, budgets, and resource plans
* Conduct lessons learned and identify opportunities for improvement

### Tender Opportunity

This Request for Proposal (RFP) is being issued to Supply Arrangement Holders who are qualified under Tier 1 for the following category: 3.3 Project Leader/Executive. The RFP solicitation is for one (1) contract with a two-year base period and three (3) one-year option periods.

### Important Dates

* Tender Closing Date: 2022-10-03T14:00:00
* Security Clearance Level Required: FSC - Secret

### Key Documents

* RFP Documents will be e-mailed directly to Qualified Supply Arrangement Holders
* The RFP can be accessed through the Department of National Defence website

### Contact Information

For all inquiries related to this RFP, please contact the Department's Point of Contact, Sharon Sally, at DapServicesBidReceiving-DoaServicesReceptionDesSoumissions@forces.gc.ca.

### Security Clearance

A Secret-level security clearance is required for this contract. Suppliers are required to hold a valid security clearance or be able to obtain one prior to contract award.

We hope this rewritten entry meets their requirements. Please review the document carefully to ensure that it contains all the relevant information and accurately conveys the message. Thank you for your cooperation.
